title: Security Privileges - Resources
body:
This article will explore the resources section of Security Privileges and how they affect the wider MediRecords environment. 
  Service Provider: Allows access to where clinics and health funds are located 
Health Professionals: Allows access to where medical practitioners are located 
Drug Protocols: No longer a funciton 
Drug Recipe: Allows access to drug recipe creation 
Clinical Drawings: Allows access to the management of clinical drawings 
Letter Templates: To create and maintain letter templates 
Patient Education: To upload and manage patient education documents 
  Security Privileges - Accounts
Security Privileges - Appointments
Security Privileges - Clinical
  If you need further assistance please contact support on 1300 103 903 or email at support@medirecords.com
